text:
It is worth being aware the Invenia’s relocation package is pretty amazing. (or a least it was to me)
All expenses paid, in terms of moving your possession and family. (More relevant i guess if moving overseas, but my visa expenses were like 5 grand Canadian, before you count the immigration laywer).
Accommodation paid for the first month or so while you find somewhere to rent.

I know it isn’t generally enough since there are important reasons people often can’t move.
But conversely, I have turned down a job offer primarily because I couldn’t afford to relocate as their relocation package was too stingy.
